name: config
description: Manage the configuration for this server
viewMessageRequiredPremiumAlert: {{PLUS}} You need to have premium to edit the birthday message. You can get premium by [patreon](https://www.patreon.com/birthdayy).
editDescription: Edit the configuration for this server
editOptionsChannelsAnnouncementDescripti: The channel to post the birthday announcement in
editOptionsMessagesAnnouncementDescripti: The message to post when someone has a birthday
editOptionsRolesBirthdayDescription: The role to give when someone has a birthday
editOptionsRolesNotifiedDescription: The role to mention when someone has a birthday
editOptionsChannelsOverviewDescription: The channel to post the birthday overview in
editOptionsTimezoneDescription: The timezone to use for birthdays
editChannelCanSendEmbeds: {{REDCROSS}} I need the permission to send embeds in {{channel}} to be able to post the birthday announcement there.
editMessageTooLong: {{REDCROSS}} The message is too long, please shorten it to {{maxLength}} characters.
editMessagePremiumRequired: {{PLUS}} You need to have premium to edit the birthday message. You can get premium by [patreon](https://www.patreon.com/birthdayy).
editRoleHierarchy: {{REDCROSS}} You cannot set the birthday role to a role higher than my highest role.
resetDescription: Reset a configuration option to its default setting
editSuccess: {{GREENTICK}} Successfully edited the configuration for this server.
editFailure: {{REDCROSS}} I wasn't able to save your changes, sorry ðŸ˜¦
